thread.title: Ole Miss student leaders call for removal of state flag because of Confederate image
thread.title_full: Ole Miss student leaders call for removal of state flag because of Confederate image

title: Ole Miss student leaders call for removal of state flag because of Confederate image
text:
Published By: Cleveland.com: US News - Today 
Student Senate members no longer want the flag to fly on the Ole Miss campus....
